en.today: Vivid dreams could provide solutions to your real-world problems, dear Aries, as the Virgo Moon aspects Neptune and Uranus. Luna drifts into harmonious Libra and aligns with Pluto as day breaks, bringing depth to developing relationships. Lower your guard with those who feel safe to evolve these connections forward, especially within matters of the heart. Mercury Rx brings a spiritual charge to the air, and the universe will send signs to prevent you from repeating past mistakes. Move with confidence when Mars activates this evening, and your efforts will take you farther than you imagined they would.

en.today: The Virgo Moon aligns with Neptune and Uranus early this morning, dearest Leo, helping you release grudges and find gratitude. Your world will feel rich and romantic once Luna enters Libra and aspects Pluto, allowing you to see beyond the surface. Ask meaningful questions and share more details about your own life to build up relationships. Mental or creative blocks may emerge while Mercury retrogrades, encouraging you to review existing work or information instead of charging forward. Passionate connections heat up this evening when Mars stirs, but you'll require a partner who can match your wit and intellect.

en.today: The Virgo Moon aspects Neptune and Uranus early this morning, dear Taurus, boosting your popularity. Pay attention to any messages you awaken to, but don't take everything you read at face value. Stay busy when Luna enters Libra and aligns with Pluto, bringing serious payoffs to your efforts. Walls that once seemed formidable will crumble if you strategically work to dismantle them, and help from peers will speed this process up. Meanwhile, Mercury Rx could have you rethinking specific commitments, giving you a chance to articulate dissatisfaction and illicit change. Mars emboldens you to cut ties with messy situations and dead weight later this evening.

en.today: Mental and emotional blocks you've been battling may dissolve overnight, dear Gemini, as the Virgo Moon aligns with Neptune and Uranus. You'll feel confident, open-hearted, and spiritually tapped in upon awakening once Luna debuts in Libra and aspects Pluto. Take a few moments to honor your ancestors and set intentions for the day, opening yourself up to guidance from beyond. Flirtations that have fizzled could make a comeback while Mercury Rx stirs, but don't give sketchy characters a chance to fool you twice. Passionate connections intensify when interests are shared or fun is made the priority once Mars activates this evening.

kh.today: ប្លុកផ្លូវចិត្តនិងផ្លូវចិត្តដែលអ្នកបានប្រយុទ្ធអាចរលាយពេញមួយយប់ Gemini ជាទីស្រឡាញ់ដែលជាទីស្រឡាញ់ដូចជាព្រះចន្ទរបស់ Virgo គឺស្របទៅនឹង Neptune និង Uranus ។អ្នកនឹងមានអារម្មណ៍ជឿជាក់ថាបើកចំហរបេះដូងហើយបានដាក់ឱ្យភ្ញាក់ខាងវិញ្ញាណនៅក្នុងពេលភ្ញាក់ឡើងនៅពេលដែល Luna បានបង្ហាញខ្លួនចេញនៅ Libra និងទិដ្ឋភាព Pluto ។យកមួយសន្ទុះមួយសន្ទុះដើម្បីគោរពបុព្វបុរសរបស់អ្នកហើយមានចេតនាកំណត់សម្រាប់ថ្ងៃដោយបើកខ្លួនអ្នករហូតដល់ការណែនាំពីលើសពីនេះ។ការចែចង់ដែលបានស្រឡាំងកាំងអាចធ្វើការត្រឡប់មកវិញខណៈដែល RX RX ជម្រុញប៉ុន្តែកុំផ្តល់ឱ្យតួអង្គប្លែកៗឱ្យខ្ញុំបោកប្រាស់អ្នកពីរដង។ការតភ្ជាប់ដែលមានចំណូលចិត្តកាន់តែខ្លាំងឡើងនៅពេលដែលផលប្រយោជន៍ត្រូវបានចែករំលែកឬភាពសប្បាយរីករាយត្រូវបានធ្វើឱ្យអាទិភាពនៅពេលដែលភពព្រះអង្គារធ្វើឱ្យសកម្មនៅល្ងាចនេះ។
